channel.title: Error on Time is life
channel.description: Recent content in Error on Time is life

item.title: Error in Python
item.description: Could not import the lzma module Error UserWarning: Could not import the lzma module. Your installed Python is incomplete pandas 1.0系以降でpandasをimportすると以下のエラーが発生する Attempting to use lzma compression will result in a RuntimeError. warnings.warn(msg) 対処 xzをbrewでインストール brew install xz pyenv uninstall 3.7.3 pyenv install 3.7.3 pyenv global 3.7.3 pip install pandas
